name: Patrick the pilot
description:
Patrick start learning to fly and he found flying really fun, but while flying he entered an restricted area that has anti planes.

Help him dodge obstacles and survive as much as you can .

Controls :

Movement : W,S or Up,Down arrows to move up and down.

Shooting : Press F to shoot rocket.

Slow-motion : Press R to Slow-motion.

Tip :

- Shoot rocket at the objects on your way to destroy them.

Credits : 

Game Designer : Abdallah Alaa

Game Idea/Testing : Muhannad Alwarawreh
